name: Ext_R5_Measure_gr_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Measure.group.subject[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Measure.group.subject[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Measure|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: E.g. Patient, Practitioner, RelatedPerson, Organization, Location, Device
element.definition: The intended subjects for the measure. If this element is not provided, a Patient subject is assumed, but the subject of the measure can be anything.
element.comment: `Measure.group.subject[x]` has no related element in R4B:Measure

element.short: E.g. Patient, Practitioner, RelatedPerson, Organization, Location, Device
element.definition: The intended subjects for the measure. If this element is not provided, a Patient subject is assumed, but the subject of the measure can be anything.
element.comment: `Measure.group.subject[x]` has no related element in R4B:Measure

binding.description: The possible types of subjects for a measure (E.g. Patient, Practitioner, Organization, Location, etc.).
